title: Breaking a horse to harness
description:
The expert guide to Breaking to Harness is a comprehensive \\\"safety aware\\\" step by step guide to all the stages of breaking a horse to harness.

The guide includes:
selecting a horse to drive
discipline
bitting
harness fit
long reining
pulling a tyre
putting to the vehicle
driving out for the first time

Filmed at Whitehouse Farm on the edge of the New Forest Clare Wigmore goes through the steps required to break an inexperienced horse to harness. She works with three horses: a hunter, an outgrown family pony and a young Welsh cob.

About Clare.
Clare Wigmore is a Light Harness Horse Instructor, a BDS judge and examiner, who has vast experience over the past 25 years of driving on a daily basis all combinations from single to team, she shares her expertise here with you in this excellent DVD.

Running time approx 55 mins
